minimumillumination: 1.5 lux (0.15fc) in color / 0.16 lux (0.016fc) in B/W (SENS Up: OFF)
controls: SDIII Electronic Shutter AGC Sensitivity Enhancement White Balance Motion Detection Digital Noise Reduction Day/Night Mode Auto Image Stabilizer Back Focus Adjustment
construction: Die cast aluminum base with 3.5mm thick tinted polycarbonate bubble
